meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Phytolacca, especially P. americana, having purple berries.
meanings.sent1: The pokeweeds grew tall in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked some pokeweeds to study in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns among the pokeweeds.
meanings.sent4: The pokeweeds stood out like royalty among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The purple berries of the pokeweeds glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The berries of this plant, used in dyeing and medicine.
meanings.sent1: She collected pokeweeds to make natural dye for her art project.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist used pokeweeds in their traditional medicine remedies.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally mistook the pokeweeds for blueberries in the pie.
meanings.sent4: The pokeweeds' berries held the secret to vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the crushed pokeweeds filled the room during the dyeing process.
